trans-unit.source: Remote debugging server for Python support in Visual Studio and Visual Studio Code
trans-unit.target: 在Visual Studio和Visual Studio Code中支持Python的远程调试服务器。

trans-unit.source: The Python Visual Studio Debugger engine implements the Visual Studio Code debug protocol and is used as the debug engine in Visual Studio and Visual Studio Code.
trans-unit.target: Python Visual Studio调试器引擎实现了Visual Studio Code调试协议,并作为Visual Studio和Studio Code的调试引擎使用。

trans-unit.source: The source code and the issue tracker is hosted on GitHub.
trans-unit.target: The source code and the issue tracker is hosted on GitHub.
